title: Restoration
description:
Robert Weinstein, Limor Cohen, Matthew Dicks and Yasmine Hasib share stories about a premature birth, a baby boom, circumcision decisions, and a night over the edge.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (The White Stripes, Matthew Dicks, Brandi Disterheft, Yasmine Hasib, Janelle Monáe, Limor Cohen, Robert Weinstein, Kevin Allison, Kate Bush, George Coleman)
